newsitem.title: JAPAN: JR East shares up after ratings unchanged.
newsitem.headline: JR East shares up after ratings unchanged.

text.p: East Japan Railway Co (JR East) shares were higher at Friday midday after Nomura Research Institute Ltd left the firm's rating unchanged at "1", brokers said.
By midday, the shares were up 130,000 yen at 532,000 yen due to relief that Nomura had not reconsidered its view of the firm, they said.

In its three-grade rating system, the research institute assigns a "1" rating to issues whose values it expects will outperform the key 225-share Nikkei average by more than 10 percentage points over the following six months.
